Summary: Boomerang shaped UFO...no sound...blended with clouds
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Broomfield
There were no other sightings in Broomfield on or around November 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband came in from walking our dog and said he may have seen a UFO. At first he thought he saw a huge bird soaring above him but said he didn't notice wing movement ... then thought it was an airplane, but heard nothing for it being so close. He noted that it blended well with the many clouds in the sky ... I said he should report it to you, but he declined. Yesterday I searched your database and saw a VERY SIMILAR sighting the same night in Denver and decided to post my husband's sighting. No photos ... He HAS had many other sightings I his lifetime.
